text.value: Please ensure the patient completes eligible vaccine doses
Click the Submit button at the bottom of the form.
Would you like to complete your vaccination?
Would you like to be vaccinated?
Kindly advise the patient to continue protecting themselves and others by wearing masks, social distancing and washing hands.
Encourage the patient to go to the health facility for vaccination follow up
The benefits of COVID-19 vaccines outweigh the side effects.Many people have reported side effects that may affect their ability to do daily activities, but they should go away within a few days.
COVID 19-vaccines are effective and can reduce the risk of getting and spreading the virus that causes COVID-19
Kindly educate the patient on the importance of COVID 19 vaccines and encourage them to go to the health facility
Please reach out to me if you change your mind and continue following up all the laid down COVID protocols.
Please refer the patient to the health facility
Date cannot be in the past or more than 14 days from today!
Please indicate the date you would like to come back and follow up with the patient
Date cannot be in the past!
Please indicate the date you would like to come back and follow up with the patient
The health facility is too far
The queue at the health facility is too long
Side effects from the earlier dose were severe
I do not think the vaccines are effective
Kindly share why you do not wish to complete your vaccination
Please add the type of vaccine received, kindly reference the vaccination card or any other verifiable source if available.
Would you like to be vaccinated?

Studies have shown that mothers pass immunity to their newborns through breast milk. This suggests those newborns have some immunity to the virus, which is especially important as young children cannot get the vaccine.
There is no evidence that COVID-19 vaccines cause fertility problems. The benefits of COVID-19 vaccination outweigh the known and potential risks.

COVID 19-vaccines are effective and can reduce the risk of getting and spreading the virus that causes COVID-19. Although each vaccine is unique, all of them offer strong protection against severe disease.
COVID 19 vaccines are safe for expectant mothers as they create immunity to the virus of the unborn baby
Please reach out to me if you change your mind and continue following up all the laid down COVID protocols.
Please refer the patient to the health facility
Some people have no side effects from COVID-19 vaccines. Many people have reported side effects that may affect their ability to do daily activities, but they should go away within a few days.
None of the COVID-19 vaccines contain the live virus that causes COVID-19, so a COVID-19 vaccine cannot make you sick with COVID-19.
COVID 19 vaccines might affect my pregnancy
COVID 19 vaccines are not safe for breastfeeding children
I am scared of getting sick with COVID 19 out of vaccination
COVID19 vaccines cause severe side effects
Kindly share why you do not wish to complete your vaccination
Would you like to receive COVID-19 vaccine?
Date cannot be in the past!
Please indicate the date you would like to come back and follow up with the patient
Is the next appointment date available/known?
Why is the vaccination status of the not up to date?
It is important to complete vaccination to reduce chances of getting infected.
**Congratulations! Thank you for protecting yourself and your loved ones.**
Kindly advise the patient to continue protecting themselves and others by wearing masks, social distancing and washing hands.
Encourage the patient to go to the health facility for vaccination follow up
Kindly check back with the health facility within the next one week
Date cannot be in the past!
When is the next appointment date?
COVID 19-vaccines can reduce the risk of getting and spreading the virus that causes COVID-19
COVID-19 vaccination is an important tool to help stop the COVID-19 pandemic
COVID-19 vaccines are safe and effective

bind.relevant: selected(../non_completion_reason, 'health_facility_far') or selected(../non_completion_reason, 'no_transport') or selected(../non_completion_reason, 'long_queue') or selected(../non_completion_reason, 'vaccine_not_effective') or selected(../non_completion_reason, 'severe_side_effects') or selected(../non_completion_reason, 'other')

selected(../non_vaccination_reason, 'scared_to_get_covid19') or selected(../non_vaccination_reason, 'infertility') or selected(../non_vaccination_reason, 'severe_side_effects') or selected(../non_vaccination_reason, 'affect_pregnancy') or selected(../non_vaccination_reason, 'breast_feeding') or selected(../non_vaccination_reason, 'not_effective') or selected(../non_vaccination_reason, 'other')
